caption.p: Survival of selected Lactobacillus fermentum BGSR163 and BGSR227 isolates, as indicated on the right, under oral conditions (0–10 min) gastric conditions (10–120 min), and intestinal conditions (120–220 min). All values are presented as mean ± SD from three independent experiments (A). Adhesion of Lactobacillus fermentum BGSR163 and BGSR227 on Caco-2 cells. All values are presented as mean ± SD from three independent experiments. (B).
